metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17578 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Dolibarr 10.0.2. It has XSS via the "outgoing email setup" feature in the admin/mails.php?action=edit URI via the "Sender email for automatic emails (default value in php.ini: Undefined)" field.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
